<cs> i am afraid i do not have an answer to that question asked by the noble lord lord wynne-jones <e> <s> i must apologise to the committee for the loose way in which my amendment has been phrased drafting amendments is new to me and i must ask noble lords to accept it as a beginners mistake <e> <s> in view of the reply of my noble friend lord ferrers and in view of the opportunity we have had to air the point i beg leave to withdraw the amendment <e>
<cs> in view of my noble friends kind explanation and of the other contributions we have had i beg leave to withdraw my amendment <e>
<cs> i apologise for confusing everybody so much <e> <s> i withdraw the amendment <e>
<cs> you can buy a colony of bees for about <e>

<cs> i think that the noble earl lord malmesbury hit one of the main things on the head we have to combine together as beekeepers and to approach this sensibly <e> <s> i am not in favour of this compensation <e> <s> i have talked to my friends in my association <e> <s> they were not in favour of it either <e>
<cs> the point is that somebody would have to help the bee when it got here because unless a bee can find congenial surroundings when it gets here it will die <e>

<cs> perhaps i may say to my noble friend that in future when i propose amendments i will be a little more careful and read things a little more carefully before i write them down <e> <s> i beg leave to withdraw the amendment <e>

<cs> my lords at the risk of a cold supper i must say a few words about the battery hen <e> <s> i have kept hens all my life under every different system <e> <s> i started off with free range hens then i progressed on to straw yards and dropping pits <e> <s> i have tried all the different systems and i ended up with the battery hen system <e> <s> in my experience hens which are kept in well run batteries are happier and better looked after than hens which are kept under other systems <e> <s> they are also very productive <e>

<cs> my lords i come fairly well down the list of speakers and inevitably some of my points will have been made <e> <s> i hope that with its usual generosity the house will excuse me if i make the same points again <e>
